tradingview.description: YOUR APPLICATION user credentials - used to look up TradingView session in KV

note: IMPORTANT: These are YOUR APP credentials, NOT TradingView credentials!
instructions: 1. Copy this file: cp credentials.example.json credentials.json
2. Edit credentials.json with YOUR APPLICATION user credentials:
- username: The email you use to log in to YOUR app
- password: The password you use to log in to YOUR app
3. These credentials are used to fetch the TradingView session from KV
4. The browser extension stores TradingView sessions in KV BY app user
FLOW: App credentials → KV lookup → TradingView session (sessionId, jwtToken)
SECURITY: credentials.json is .gitignored and never committed to the repository
